statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: John Brown scored 27 points and Lorenzo Cugini hit a late 3-pointer that gave his team the lead for good as High Point rallied to beat Charleston Southern 78-73 on Saturday night.
article.headline: High Point rallies to beat Charleston Southern 78-73
article.linkText: High Point rallies to beat Charleston Southern 78-73
article.story: CHARLESTON, S.C. -- John Brown scored 27 points and Lorenzo Cugini hit a late 3-pointer that gave his team the lead for good as High Point rallied to beat Charleston Southern 78-73 on Saturday night. Cugini finished with 17 points for the Panthers (11-4, 4-0 Big South). Anthony Lindauer added 11 points and five rebounds and Adam Weary had 10 points and four rebounds. High Point trailed 69-61 with 8:13 to play when Brown sank a pair of layups and Weary hit a 3-pointer and a layup to help the Panthers pull to within two, 73-71, with 3:15 left. Cugini followed with a 3-pointer to put the Panthers on top 74-73 with 2:29 to go and they held on as Charleston Southern failed to score again. Charleston Southern had a 48-40 advantage at the break and led through much of the second half. Aaron Wheeler led the Buccaneers (5-9, 1-2) with 18 points and nine rebounds.
